Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a card from a standard playing deck of 52 cards

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int ACE 
      int CLUBS 
      int DIAMONDS 
      int HEARTS 
      int JACK 
      int KING 
      int QUEEN 
      int SPADES 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(int s, int r)
      the default constructor which allows the user to specify the card suit and rank

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Card c)
      the equals method returns true if the ranks of the two cards are equal
      java.lang.String getFilename()
      returns the name of the file containing the card's image
      int getRank()
      the getRank method returns the rank of the card
      java.lang.String getSuit()
      the getSuit method returns the suit of the card as an int
      boolean isBiggerThan(Card c)
      returns true if the original card is bigger than the one it's being compared to
      java.lang.String toString()
      returns the suit and rank of the card as a string

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int s,
            int r)
        the default constructor which allows the user to specify the card suit and rank
        Parameters:
        s - the suit of the card expressed as an integer, 1=spades, 2=clubs, 3=hearts, and 4=diamonds
        r - the number value(rank) of the card

    • Method Detail

      • getSuit

        public java.lang.String getSuit()
        the getSuit method returns the suit of the card as an int

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        the getRank method returns the rank of the card

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Card c)
        the equals method returns true if the ranks of the two cards are equal
        Parameters:
        c - the card that is being compared to the original card

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        returns the suit and rank of the card as a string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • isBiggerThan

        public boolean isBiggerThan(Card c)
        returns true if the original card is bigger than the one it's being compared to
        Parameters:
        c - the card to be compared to

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()
        returns the name of the file containing the card's image
